data.3: How will you comprehend what the startling calamity is? --
data.4: A Day on which human beings would be like so many scattered moths,
data.5: The mountains like the tufts of carded wool.
data.6: Then he whose deeds shall weigh heavier in the scale
data.8: But he whose deeds are lighter in the balance
data.9: Will have the Abyss for abode.
data.10: How will you comprehend what that is?
